description: Drop into the white room wearing the Men's Torgon Winter Jacket. Marmot MemBrain® waterproof/breathable fabric and 100% seam taping keep you dry in miles of fresh powder, while wind-resistant PrimaLoft® Black Insulation ECO offers warmth without weight. Heat-releasing PitZips cool you down when you work up a sweat. The helmet-compatible hood, fixed powder skirt, inner thumbholes, and VELCRO® wrist cuffs provide extra coverage from the elements. Stow ski gear in multiple zippered pockets.
name: Marmot Torgon Jacket - Mens
